title: Ao no Exorcist: Kyoto Fujouou-hen (Blue Exorcist: Kyoto Saga)
synopsis: The ExWire of True Cross Academy are beset with shock and fear in the aftermath of discovering that one of their own classmates, Rin Okumura, is the son of Satan. But for the moment, they have more pressing concerns than that of Rin's parentage: the left eye of the Impure King, a powerful demon, has been stolen from the academy's Deep Keep. After an attempt is made to steal the right eye in Kyoto as well, Rin and the other ExWires are sent to investigate the mystery behind the Impure King and the ultimate goal of the thief.
related_anime: ['Ao no Exorcist', 'Ao no Exorcist: Kyoto Fujouou-hen OVA']
